title: Black Wolf Irregulars
description:
The Black Wolf Irregulars are a mercenary organization that has existed in northern [Elathia](/geo/continents/elathia) for the last 200 years or so, hiring themselves out by company to various militaries. They have a history of taking in those who don't fit into a standard military structure and coming up with unusual tactics designed to take advantage of them. After the formation of the [Alliance of 6 Nations](/org/allianceof6nations) they were hired en masse by the same to be a cross-national force that worked strictly for the Alliance as a whole. The Irregulars typically work in small squads on the peripheries of major battles, handling scouting missions, infiltration missions, and other missions that require unusual or specialized training for a small number of individuals.

Despite their reputation for success and loyalty to their contractors, they still tend to be distrusted by national professional militaries.
rules: Complete the objective  you are given, even if it means working outside of typical means and methods.
Keep in contact with your commanding officer.
Leave no man behind.  Work as a team with your squad and don't leave anyone in enemy hands.

ranks.name: Camp Follower
ranks.description: They let you follow them around. You don't get a cut of the loot though, and you probably aren't invited into combat.

ranks.name: Irregular
ranks.description: You are respected enough to finally get a cut of the loot. Not much of course, but some.

ranks.name: Black Wolf
ranks.description: You are now a trusted member of the irregulars, you are called upon for most missions, and get a decent portion of the loot.

features.name: Informed
features.description: You are always given information related to the Black Wolves location, and their current missions and objectives.

features.name: Equipped
features.description: The irregulars supply you with basic equipment to the tune of 100 gp of gear.

features.name: Cut of the Loot
features.description: You gain a +1 weapon or a wand for a 1st level spell of your choice.

features.name: Advanced Training
features.description: Add +1 to one ability score of your choice. Also pick 1 skill you are proficient in, you gain expertise in that skill.
